Class MaryXML

newDocument

public static org.w3c.dom.Document newDocument()

createElement

public static org.w3c.dom.Element createElement(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                                java.lang.String elementName)
In the given MaryXML document, create a new element of the given name, with the proper namespace.

Parameters:
doc - a MaryXML document
elementName - the name of the MaryXML document
Returns:
the newly created MaryXML element.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the document is not a maryxml document with the proper namespace.
